description: A flavorful 19th century before dinner drink with a clear red orange color and strong taste. It's one of the best classic cocktails in the bartender's book - Manhattan! This classic Manhattan is the original Manhattan recipe, composed of Italian vermouth, rye whiskey and angostura bitters, combined and stirred to perfection with maraschino cherry as its garnish.
name: Manhattan Cocktail

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the ingredients into a glass and add ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the ingredients into a glass and add ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
